name: Kaluana
description:
History:

Ages and ages ago, a young warrior had fallen in love with the most beautiful princess of all kingdoms, but to ask her hand in marriage, the bravest warrior must overcome a great Pyramid of Challenges, an inhospitable place, where many dared to conquer but no one returned. The legend says that even today, he wanders around the pyramid, to conquer thy beloved.

Developers:

Art:
Michel Lacerda

Design & Gameplay:
Aron Castro
Michel Lacerda

Theme Music:
Arthur Alves

Sound effects:
Freesound - https://freesound.org/
Soundly - https://getsoundly.com/
